website_summaries.verdict: Alternative 1-piece lacrosse training goal; launch your ball at the target net and it will rebound at game speed. Easily folds for transportation.
pros: All-in-one frame is easy to fold down when not in use, and weighs 35 pounds, making it easy to transport
Constructed from 2-inch square powder coated aircraft grade aluminum tubing
cons: Some users find the rubber foot pads peel away easily

customer_reviews.title: Love this rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and very sturdy. I looked at several before deciding to make the investment in this one. I have been very impressed. It is relatively big and heavy so we just use it in our backyard, but it works great for both soccer and basketball training. Great for helping kids develop good passing and receiving. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 and 11 yo boys. Both are big soccer players and it has gotten a lot of use. The tension and adjustability are excellent and I really can't imagine a better option...they also use it for lacrosse, baseball,and basketball practice. The 8 yo can adjust it by himself, so it must be pretty easy to figure out. It was a bit challenging to get together but not that bad...maybe took 45 minutes from unboxing to playing. Definitely needed two people to get the net tight, but one of them was my 11 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frank

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This will help you (or your kiddos) reach the "next level" in footwork skill. Mind you, this is not a toy and the net is so tight that it could hurt little hands if they want to climb (think almost wire tension). There are a number of Youtube videos on how to use this. I believe the price (steep, no doubt) is warranted. We have used other rebounders before - none compare to this trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Silher

customer_reviews.title: Balls that work best
customer_reviews.text: Three kids entertained for hours on end. I bought this net because if the five star reviews. Adding mine now. The larger size works great for my kids. They can all play at the same time and have even made up some games together using it. The net is very sturdy even on cement ( we have ours on cement pushed up to a fence). Balls we have tested: Kids have used it mostly for baseball and it's awesome. Basketballs are a little heavy but still work. Tennis did not work as well. Soccer is great. Lacrosse is great.
customer_reviews.author: GroRo

customer_reviews.title: net started coming apart and the rubber feet constantly fell ...
customer_reviews.text: net started coming apart and the rubber feet constantly fell off, also the thing wouldn't stay put in driveway because every time my son kicked the soccer ball into it would move back a little had to constantly readjust.
customer_reviews.author: tito rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not doubt, amazing product.  Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So, like most things I did way too much research. Was all stressed as to which one (tekk vs goalrilla) because they arent cheap. Well, the Tekk is awesome! Its solid, light, huge surface area and easy to play with. Can handle anything you throw at it with ease. From kids to adults. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great support
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to updated this review. Buy this if you want a rebounder. I have had it now for at least 4 years and it is rock solid. Money well spent never disappointed. Good product does everything you asked it to do. Called support and they handled all my issues fast and quickly. I thought the kids would just use it for Soccer, but now it is the everything in the yard. Lacrosse, Football, Baseball, a pitch back for kickball. What a purchase and the quality is awesome. Power coated, great net, and connections. The entire neighborhood is in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: B5

customer_reviews.title: Good for soccer and basketball!
customer_reviews.text: I am not handy and I was able to set this up in 25 minutes with the help of another person. The net took about half of the time due to tension but the two tools provided made stretching it doable. The instructions were only OK, it’s very sturdy and but easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wow, we didn't realize just how effective this would ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, we didn't realize just how effective this would be. Does everything it says it will do, and we can actually see the kids footwork, ball control, and their body movements becoming more natural.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Would purchase again in a heartbeat, but is durable enough that we haven't had to! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids use it all the time, easy enough to move
customer_reviews.text: Bought with hesitation because of small yard space and experience buying stuff that the kids stop using after the initial excitement. This one is both fun and a training device and so far it's gotten a lot of use. Love that it's easy enough to move ( though it take 2 as it's 8 feet long). Was no problem for me and my 13 year old to assemble in about 20 minutes, very clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: I.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder! Watch the video to set up easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for both my 7 & 10 year old soccer mad kids!! Excellent design and well built product. Helps them with their touches giving different weight and height passes back, and also acts a "third man" to cross the ball to help practice volleys and control and shots. Do yourself a favor though and watch the video for easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: this rebound net has held up great in the Texas heat
customer_reviews.text: After a year of abuse, this rebound net has held up great in the Texas heat.
customer_reviews.author: elijah101

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer and Lacrosse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter as a Christmas present to satisfy her soccer-Jones and so she can practice indoors during the winter and loooong springs in N. Illinois. She loves it and it's really helped her footwork and reaction speed. My son has added lacrosse and he's used it quite a bit as well and already has multiple killer scoring moves (we marked an inner zone for a lacrosse goal dimensions).
customer_reviews.author: J. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Best Trainer on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids who all play the game, all play in goal and out in the field. It is fantastic for working on multiple aspects of the game for the different positions. Especially good for working on hand drills and trapping drills with the kids. Look forward to many years of use (hopefully) from this. Seems very well made and strong, worst part was trying to get the net on (was a good workout on your hands). Other than that very easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great rebounder! We don't have a large yard and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rebounder! We don't have a large yard and our schedules are all over the place so it's hard to schedule time to run drills together. This rebounder allows you to practice so many different aspects of the game in a small space and without needing a partner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome training tool
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old plays on a select soccer team and is pretty serious about his game. We've long had a goal in our yard, but this rebounder is way more fun for a single player to use. He kicks, the ball bounces back ... over and over and over. It's a great tool! Very well made, sturdy. It took my pre-teen and me about 45 minutes to put the whole thing together. Piece of cake!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boone

customer_reviews.title: A solid investment for building soccer skills.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best designed rebounders out there. I wish it performed better on passes made on the ground. Often times the metal bar at the bottom just kill the ball speed and it doesn't return. Balls in the air work perfectly though.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ford

customer_reviews.title: works great. customer support helped me when i broke it.
customer_reviews.text: bought this 7 months ago. works great, daughter's juggling saw huge improvement. watch youtube videos for ideas. 2 weeks ago at a party at my home a few kids were horsing around and fell into the net and their combined weight bent the bottom the support tubes. took me a couple calls to TEKK, but customer support helped me and sent out spare parts within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: TC San Diego CA

customer_reviews.title: Best rebounder ever!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly should be done with 2 people. Other than that, EXCELLENT design and performance! Thrilled with the results and how it is improving the skills of my soccer player.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have never been much for practicing when it came to soccer--- this device has totally changed that. They LOVE it. It is very cool, and well worth the money. They watch some of the youtube videos to get ideas for drills. They also play games placing a clothes pin on different parts of the net (from behind), then try to knock the pin off by hitting it with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Phonomenal
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together is VERY difficult. The tension on the bungee cords is intense so have at least two large adults to make the job go easy. Once assembled it operates as promised and the breakdown for storage and transport is a cinch provided you leave teh netting in place.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and many uses
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this everyday for volleyball and soccer practice. Sturdy and well built. Had a little problem with assembly but called customer service and they helped me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Daniels, Kids Yoga Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Top End Rebounder
customer_reviews.text: Rebounder that works for multiple sports. Our children use it for soccer and lacrosse. Ability to angle the rebounder also allows to practice different aspects of game -- straight/fast shots back or higher arching.
customer_reviews.author: Sporty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. My boys
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. My boys, seven and nine, use it for baseball and soccer. It's a high quality product that is super stable. The instructions were easy enough, but I watching the assembly video available on the website did make putting it together even easier.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: since he got this he has become a better ball handler
customer_reviews.text: Our son plays travel soccer, since he got this he has become a better ball handler, he puts drills together and love using it everyday. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: April Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: ... soccer late but practices on this and is getting better at controlling the ball
customer_reviews.text: Trainer for someone new at playing soccer my son started playing soccer late but practices on this and is getting better at controlling the ball .
customer_reviews.author: ELH

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing training tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing training tool. I bought it for my boys to practice their soccer skills on their own. The rebounding effect is excellent. My only word of warning is that it requires a lot of strength to assemble it because the bungee cords are so tight (to produce the rebound). You definitely need two strong people to put it together, but once done, it is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Alley

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder, very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great rebounder, very well made! Only complaint is the support arms are very long. If you have limited space...take that into consideration. You will lose about 5 feet from the wall/fence. Other than that, big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: isellprinters

customer_reviews.title: Product looks durable- but the packaging was not strong enough for the shipper
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it arrived with a large hole in the package, as though it was made to allow the shipper to grab hold. It was a heavy package. The product should have a package designed with a handle hole to aid the shipping and moving of this item. This will get a lot of use for soccer and lacrosse. appreciated the black Friday discount.
customer_reviews.author: jem39

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son (U15) player to help keep his ball handling skills at high level during off season. It was a good investment. He uses it regularly. It's sturdy, easy to put together, easy to adjust and easy to move around to different locations. Anyone wanting to keep their skills fine tined will find this a very useful product.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: If you need a rebounder, this is a high quality one. It has a very large surface area and the ball rebounds back very well. I also was missing a couple of foot pads, they came off during shipping and customer service was excellent. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dadof3

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool / modified goal...
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but very well worth it if you have a dedicated soccer player in your home. We set it up in the basement for the winter, which was easy. It is versatile and will be a huge benefit in the backyard come spring. Sturdy and effective.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Touches, its all about the touches.
customer_reviews.text: It's really a 5 star product, but the directions need to be revised. I had a corner strap break during installation, but a 2 minute phone call had a new one on its way. My daughter is an above average player and puts her rebounder to the test daily without any problems. Excellent product for any player who wants to improve their game.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Meserole

customer_reviews.title: SOLID....I MEAN SOLID!
customer_reviews.text: most of the other ones you can purchase are flimsy.I know this is expensive but it will be the last one you purchase. My (soccer) kids are 17 and 14 and play with this everyday - perfect and best all - this will be the last one I buy.
customer_reviews.author: J Rusty Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Customer support came through!
customer_reviews.text: very popular and has helped daughter graduate to soccer ball juggling more easily. See youtube videos on this for more info. had an accident a few months later and bent a tube. called TEKK and they sent out replacement parts very quickly. took me a few calls to get thru, but they did a good job.
customer_reviews.author: TC San Diego CA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your kids plays soccer, must have item! If you leave it outside it will rust. We've owned it now for 5 years. Good product but you will need to replace minor parts around the 5 year mark.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Hohler

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My kids use this to practice volleyball. The size is perfect. They have really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Coach Recommended Net
customer_reviews.text: Great Net and quality superb. Alternate the bungees when putting them on at the end. It helps this process go smoother. Don't hook all the top cords and then think you can attach all the bottem ones. Do one on top then one on the bottem and work your way down the net. Also great for home use but NOT portable unless you have a truck. It will lay flat but is still about 52" across. not sure it would even fit in our Ford Expedition. The team purchased it as a year end gift for their coach and it will not fit in either of his SUV's. So do not buy this thinking you can transport it easily around.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great goal, my son plays on it all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great goal, my son plays on it all the time and his touch has improved dramatically. He used to juggle a lot but this product has added a ton of exercises to his practicing. There are only two complaints that I have. One is the the net connector has started to rip on the bottom left hand corner after only having it for 3 months. The other is the net is extremely hard to put on, not worth to take it off. Great product overall
customer_reviews.author: Mark Allen Baroni

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy. Some much sturdier than the other brands. I believe it will outlast me and my kids. If you like soccer and you want to improve I highly recommend this trainer. Awesome tool for goal keepers as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. F. Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer skills
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely worth the money. Our son's (8yrs) ball skills improved a lot and he uses it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Trillium

customer_reviews.title: There was a great video my husband used while assembling that made it ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a great video my husband used while assembling that made it much easier. My boys love it. High quality bounce back!
customer_reviews.author: K. Green

customer_reviews.title: great rebounder for soccer
customer_reviews.text: easy to to set up, sturdy, realistic bounces....we play on it every day since we bought it. I would recommend to anybody who wants to improve their ball control skills.
customer_reviews.author: Libor Zavalsky

customer_reviews.title: This really is a nice product. It's built out of quality material and ...
customer_reviews.text: This really is a nice product. It's built out of quality material and well engineered. Did I mention it was super easy to setup? My son loves this thing!
customer_reviews.author: parkerpkthn

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We use it for my 9 and 12 year olds. Hours of fun. So much better than those smaller ones. Great tension in the net, great flexibility to use both sides for different skills. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin J.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: You are never sure when viewing online if something is going to be thin and cheaply made or heavy and quality built. This is definitely a quality product. Assembly is easy and the young soccer players in the household love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chalmer Williams

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: fantastic training tool, my boys love it. the first day they played with it for over 10 hours. it really bounces the ball back well and the kids can make up several games using it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Best Rebounder You Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: We researched a lot before deciding to buy the Tekk Trainer Rebounder. There isn't a sturdier or better built product on the market. Assembly took my wife and I about 30 minutes. The hardest part was stretching the rebounder net (definitely a two person job!). My son uses the rebounder for both soccer and lacrosse. Keeps him busy and allows him to practice on his own as much as he likes which is usually daily.
customer_reviews.author: Shomare

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder though is expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great rebounder though is expensive....still way better than any others I've seen in stores like Dick's or Sports Authority. It's pretty substantial which means it has some weight to it to cant get knocked over easily which is good when striking a ball at it or leaving outside so wind doesn't move it around, etc. It can be adjusted to make the way the ball rebounds back varied to be higher to practice more balls out of the air or rebound lower so playing with foot or even working on one touch. I just wished my kids used it more but it's a great trainer.
customer_reviews.author: ROJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter loves it and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: wjp

customer_reviews.title: Given as gift
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift. The person who received it is very satisfied and it is used on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: DEK

customer_reviews.title: Happy so  far
customer_reviews.text: GREAT quality, my son loves it! It is huge. Works well. happy with is thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Hurley Family

customer_reviews.title: Soccer Use
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome for soccer, until I miss the goal! I have not tried to break it down and carry it with me, but hope that will not be hard to do. Great for practicing shooting and passing drills.
customer_reviews.author: R D, WA

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sturdy, quality construction and materials. A real workout, two person job to get the net on but worth the effort. I would totally recommend this rebounder, especially for teens and older.
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger surface area than most pitch backs. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger surface area than most pitch backs. My kids use it for all kinds of sports: basketball, soccer, lacrosse, baseball, softball
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Good for Winter
customer_reviews.text: This is actually harder than it looks. The product is well built and is pretty easy to put together. Plenty challenging.
customer_reviews.author: jazzyj

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: 10th grader goalie uses it for training. Super strong and durable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley M Powell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together just follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together just follow the instructions. Fantastic training tool. My son loves it and his throwing and catching has improved dramatically. Great product, easy to adjust. My kids get their throws in on their own time and are no longer dependent each other's or my schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Zerpirc

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, well built, and works great. Grandkids love it and it stays setup and ready for after-school fun.
customer_reviews.author: DanaPapa

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty rebounder.
customer_reviews.text: Built solid and the net is super taut. The first kick into it about took my head off... My kids love it, they're constantly competing to see who can get the most touches. Assembly was pretty easy just took some time. Overall very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: rsmars

customer_reviews.title: My son uses this all of the time for soccer ...
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this all of the time for soccer and loves it. It was difficult to pull the netting piece over the frame, as it was very tight! It took 3 of us to complete the assembly. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Mulvey-Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rebounder. You can find cheaper ones, but you get what you pay for. Installation was easy once we ditched the written instructions and watched the Tekk Set-up Video ([...]). Took my wife and I less than 15 mins total.
customer_reviews.author: ZiggyPop

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mainly for my oldest son to use with practice for basketball. It was easy to put together and he immediately started using it on different drills. Then my daughter started playing around with practicing serving and spiking a volleyball. My youngest son can't wait to use it for soccer drills this summer. This was a good buy for my family!
customer_reviews.author: douglas parrish

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.  Quality is not cheap but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I did my research. This rebounder is great! It is very sturdy and performs as expected. It took my son and I 25 minutes to assemble. I just wish Tekk would make a carrier bag for this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Folds up for storage
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for mom to lug around the yard, but the kids have enjoyed using it. Strong, sturdy, solidly made. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PDDockery

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: We love our rebounder. It is the perfect size and has helped my son so much with his touches. He can practice for hours without needing a second person with him to pass the ball back. This product is well worth the purchase price and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Coree

customer_reviews.title: Too big for traveling but its a good tool for solo practice
customer_reviews.text: Too big for traveling but its a good tool for solo practice. We used it for volleyball. Not too effective for passing and setting but good for hitting and spiking when you don't have a good solid wall around.
customer_reviews.author: Truong

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Training tool
customer_reviews.text: Great Soccer training tool. Easy to set up without tools and in little time. Kids of all ages can use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Warren Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder is an excellent investment for a serious soccer/football player. We have this set up in our basement (it's winter here in Michigan!) and our son and his friends have had many hours of kicking the ball into this rebounder. Our boy is a goal tender and enjoys kicking the ball and saving the rebounds. It's light weight and easy to move around...can't wait to see this in our yard this spring! Lots of rebound action. Definitely get this net!
customer_reviews.author: andmas1964

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad of set up
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad of set up, but provides an excellent rebounding tool. I wish there was a sharper ball return when you kick the ball against the very bottom. Granted, that would be a litter harder to engineer.
customer_reviews.author: Heath E Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Tekk
customer_reviews.text: I have 12 year old son and 10 year old daughter. They really enjoy practicing on TEKK rebounder. This maximize the touches and improve quick reflex. I will recommend TEKK to get serious practice and see the improvement in performance. Delivery from Amazon is excellent. Good design and good investment for developing a soccer player.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan Arulampalam

customer_reviews.title: Heavy enough to stay put but light enough to move ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy enough to stay put but light enough to move around. This thing has quite a bit of pop and power to it . Has plenty of choices for angles. Very well built and looks professional.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the rebounder. A link to a ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the rebounder. A link to a video came with this product, which made putting the rebounder together so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly from Pa

customer_reviews.title: worst customer support ever (revised)
customer_reviews.text: worst customer support ever. I wish I could take stars away. I have been calling for the last three days, and no one ever returns my call. Good luck with getting help. Edit: I did get a call a couple of days later. They did a great job helping me set up the rebounder (is is not intuitive). In the end I was happy...it just took longer than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This trainer is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two other trainers from Dick Sporting Goods during the last 5 years that cost less than the Tekk did. I got what I paid for, one rusted and fell apart, and the other didn't work well at all. The Tekk Trainer is a quality well designed piece of equipment. It came quickly, was easy to put together and does exactly what they said it would do. My 10 yr old loves it. I would absolutely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Watkins

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best rebounder on the market hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for soccer, baseball and football. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Strickler

customer_reviews.title: but once you get over that it is a an awesome rebounder.
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research before I bought this. It was a pain to put the net on, but once you get over that it is a an awesome rebounder.
customer_reviews.author: icelord

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder is big and well constructed. A great training tool for any age.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautifully engineered and built to last. I highly recommend it to anyone with young (or old) soccer players in the family!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Heeg

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor entertainment when you have soccer players over
customer_reviews.text: My son is a soccer player and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Great and worthy net !!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great net !!! This is high quality substantial item and very useful !!! My son is able to go out back and shoot at his leisure and doesn't have to wait for a friend or run back and fourth. We have a regular net as well. This is great shooting practice. Get this if you have hard core players in your family ! Wish it had a winter cover though to make it last and protect it.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible to setup
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and his touches have improved. Difficult to setup since the instructions were not very clear. The parts are not labeled, so I spent some time trying to figure out which was left, center top, etc. This is a two person setup or one aggravated person. Arrived without the stakes and I immediately called the Tekk support number provided. Their customer service representative was courteous and stated they would send the stakes right out, which never arrived. Thus the three stars. *** update The stakes did arrive about a day after posting. They were true to their word and now I have no complaints with the product or customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gail G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - a great training tool for serious soccer players!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for improving soccer skills!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 10 year old son loves it, uses it every day and is great for his footwork. My 15 year old daughter also uses it, more now that she sees how much her litle brother is improving!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble Works for lots of sports. It is easy to move in the yard. My kids are practicing more because of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Tricky net mounting, lack of a drill example manual especially for the different positions- other than that, great product/quality Use on a daily basis Will definitely recommand
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Roy

customer_reviews.title: The Tekk Trainer is fantastic. My daughter is a very good player and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tekk Trainer is fantastic. My daughter is a very good player and she uses it just about every day. She loves it and it's made her a better technical player.
customer_reviews.author: Kopite13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our nine-year-old son, who plays soccer, baseball, and lacrosse. He hasn't tried it yet for lacrosse, but it works great for soccer and baseball. He loves it and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J. Gautschi

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: A little tough at first getting the net on, but great for ball skill. Would recommend to anyone with kids who are looking to have fun & improve ball skill at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Construction is solid and the rebounding is very responsive. Not sure how portable this will be in the future, but we have it setup in our basement and my nine year old soccer playing is having a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Vangen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, yet easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Just what we expected and hoped for. Very sturdy, yet easy to move. My teenage kids use it nearly non-stop.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Randall

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been fun for my son to use to get some more touches on the ball in preparation for his upcoming soccer season. He's quite enjoyed it. The quality seems to be very good so far.
customer_reviews.author: tonnie-K

customer_reviews.title: awesome for basketball  ( im a highschool bball player)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tekk trainer for practicing shooting off a pass, it works perfectly. I keep it under the net so miss or make it returns the ball to me so i can get in more reps.
customer_reviews.author: basketball

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Good for using as a small goal, or tilting back at various angles for rebounding fun. Very challenging to assemble with marginal instructions--and I am mechanically inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Gytis Simaitis

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to use for my 9 year old for training, but a pain the you know what to put together...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old plays travel futbol (soccer) & this is a fantastic tool for him to use. He absolutely loves his Tekk Trainer. It's very well made & will last for years. The only issue I have is that it's kind of a pain to assemble. The net in particular definitely take 2 people to put on.
customer_reviews.author: psk

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have ever ordered online. Super well made and easy to put together. You will get countless hours of practice with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Louer

customer_reviews.title: Good product....not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Heavy. Kids are getting lots of use from it. Standing up well to the weather which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan C Colhoun

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: well made, with good solid made to last parts. Directions to put together are not great, but OK, requires at least 2 to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: charlie hutchinson

product_meta.title: Tekk Trainer Rebounder Goal (Soccer, Basketball, Lacrosse, Baseball)
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM


Tekk® is the leader in the next generation of training equipment. With its patented one-piece design it is the strongest and largest trainer on the market with 40 square feet of surface area. With a powder coated frame made of aircraft grade aluminum and 3mm thick steel brackets it has the strongest rebound of anything available. The angle adjusts to seven positions for all around training. The Tekk® Trainer is extremely strong and durable and built to last for years.

PRACTICE ON YOUR OWN AND GET BETTER FASTER
With the Tekk® Trainer you don't need anyone else. You can practice by yourself and get better on your own with the exact same product the pros use at their training sessions. The ball comes back to you at game speed, simulating real game situations. This enables field players and goalkeepers to master their technique and control. It is also perfect for baseball and lacrosse.



Angle adjusts to seven positions for all around training. Field Players 

Practice side volleys, in-step, passing, shooting, trapping, and heading. Work on ball control with your thigh and chest. Strengthen your weaker foot. Increase leg strength. Control and shoot; control and dribble. Practice ball striking and finishing. Use it as a wall. 

Goalkeepers 

Work on your footwork and diving. Master your hand positions, catching, and body shape. Strengthen your arm and throwing accuracy. Improve quickness and agility. Allows you to react to game type situations 

PRODUCT FEATURES
Strongest portable trainer on the market; crossbar withstands 125lb load Largest fully portable trainer on the market that angles; 40 square feet of target area Sets up in five minutes All in one-piece; folds up for easy storage; weighs 35lbs Angle adjusts to seven positions for all around training  



Made of aircraft grade aluminum and 3mm thick steel brackets. Built to last for years. 

Ball comes back to you at game speed Used by the pros in soccer for daily training Used by college athletes for soccer, baseball and lacrosse Easily convert into a soccer goal with the purchase of a Tekk® soccer goal conversion kit Practice target shooting for soccer and lacrosse and use the Tekk® Trainer for football and hockey with the purchase of a Tekk® target rebounder net SPECIFICATIONS
2 inch square aircraft grade aluminum tubing Heavy duty 3mm thick steel brackets Tubing and brackets are powder coated Folded dimensions in inches: 60L x 10W x 4H Set-up dimensions in feet: 5H x 8W x 4D Weight: 35lbs ACCESSORIES INCLUDED
Rebounder Net: 45 ply P.E. knotted 1.75 inch square 6mm Net bungee straps with stainless steel hooks Heavy duty 12 spikes with flanges Rubber pads ABOUT TEKK®
Tekk® was founded in 1999 with the sole purpose of developing innovative products to pioneer change in the training methods of professional and amateur athletes, resulting in the development of technically sound athletes around the world. All of our products are developed through the input of professional coaches and athletes. Our company policy, Tekk® products must first be consistently used by the pros or we will not introduce them into the market place. As a result, Tekk® products are of the highest quality and they are guaranteed to make you better. Tekk® is for those who have the desire and passion for excellence. *None of the individuals in the videos have been paid for their comments regarding Tekk® products.
feature_bullets: Basketball – practice game situation passing, catching, shooting and dribbling
Angle adjusts to seven positions for all around training
Strongest and largest portable trainer on the market, built to last for years
Soccer – perfect for field players and goalkeepers - practice passing, shooting, trapping and heading; improve your weaker foot and increase leg strength

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
